title: Psalmes and hymnes of praier and thanksgiuing. Made by VVilliam Barlow, Bishop of Lincolne, for his owne chappell and familie onelie
author: Barlow, William, d. 1613.
notes: The words "Psalmes and hymnes" and "praier and thanksgiuing" are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
